name: CLASH!!! (Beta Release)
description:
NOTE: This is the Beta Release of the game, and is still in development. The final version will be released in December 2020.  Also, the WebGL version of this game is VERY laggy. For the best experience, PLEASE DOWNLOAD AND EXTRACT THE WINDOWS BUILD OF THIS GAME!

Take simultaneous control of 2 sentient beings: Light and Dark. Race to climb to the roof of a tower before time runs out! Traverse through the obstacles, and get both characters together in the Clash Zone. Duel in a simple Rhythm-style minigame. Time all of your inputs in the Clash without missing to move onto the next level.
